TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LogCallback(Logger.LogLevel level, string message, bool containsPii);
.class public auto ansi sealed LogCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Indicates if the log message contains PII. If Logger.PiiLoggingEnabled is set to false then this value is always false.
Docs.summary: Callback delegate that allows the developer to consume logs handle them in a custom manner.
